thread.title: Cheap but very comfortable
thread.title_full: Cheap but very comfortable - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: GFrankers
title: Cheap but very comfortable
text:
A basic in and out hotel, very efficient check in (if they have enough staff) clean and very comfortable rooms, although on this stay the room i was in was very hot and stuffy despite having the window open. Good powerful shower and great bed and pillows. Location next to Euston Station means it is easy access to the Tube network in all directions. My go to place if out for the eve in Marylebone or Camden
Room Tip: Rooms on the south and east side more noisy due to road. See more room tips
